thread.title: Airtel to reportedly offer double data to new 4G dongle and hotspot users
thread.title_full: Airtel to reportedly offer double data to new 4G dongle and hotspot users

title: Airtel to reportedly offer double data to new 4G dongle and hotspot users
text:
Airtel to reportedly offer double data to new 4G dongle and hotspot... Airtel to reportedly offer double data to new 4G dongle and hotspot users By - January 27, 2017 “Airtel now offers 8GB of 4G data with the base Rs 450 hotspot or dongle plan” 
Ever since the commercial launch of Reliance Jio, all the telecom operators in the country have been launching new competitive plans. Airtel has been getting aggressive with new data and unlimited calling plans and now the company is reportedly offering extra data to users who purchase a new 4G dongle or hotspot. 
As per Telecom Talk , this offer is only for new users, who will be asked to choose between four different plans starting from Rs 450 and going up to Rs 1,500. The base Rs 450 rental pack earlier offered 4GB of 4G data, but now it offers 8GB of data. The Rs 650 plan now offers 12GB of data, the Rs 999 pack offers 20GB of data and Rs 1,500 plan now offers 40GB of 4G data. 
According to the source, Airtel’s new double 4G data offer for hotspot or dongle users is valid for three months from the date of purchase. The company hasn’t yet officially confirmed the launch of the double data plans.
